title: National Museum of Funeral History presents Annual Haunted House
address: 415 Barren Springs Dr. Houston, TX 77090 United States
body: Get in to the Halloween spirit all month long and be “scared to death” at this family-friendly haunted house. Explore different scenes designed to give goose bumps to young and old alike while taking a light-hearted view of a usually very serious subject. Admission: Tickets are $3 - $5.

title: Hansel and Gretel at Miller Outdoor Theatre
address: 6000 Hermann Park Drive Houston, TX 77030 United States
body: The famous fairy tale from the Brothers Grimm, Hansel and Gretel, comes to operatic life in a 45-minute, family-friendly production at Miller Outdoor Theatre. Admission This event is free to attend.

title: Yoga at Discovery Green
address: 1500 Mckinney St Houston, TX 77010 United States
body: Strengthen, relax and recharge at this free outdoor yoga class at Discovery Green park. Admission This event is free to attend. Yoga mats are available for purchase.

title: Heartfulness Meditation at Discovery Green
address: 1500 Mckinney St Houston, TX 77010 United States
body: Take the time to strengthen the connection between the heart and body during this outdoor meditation class at Discovery Green. Admission This event is free to attend.

title: Zumba at Levy Park
body: Dance while working out at this outdoor evening Zumba class at Levy Park. Admission This event is free to attend.

title: Kareem Jackson Foundation presents Dinner for a Difference at the Briar Club
address: 2603 Timmons Ln. Houston, TX 77027 United States
body: Houston Texans cornerback Kareem Jackson and his teammates will be on hand at for Jackson's inaugural Dinner for a Difference, presented by Woodforest National Bank. Guests can enjoy a cocktail reception presented by Chicago Title Houston and Northwestern Mutual leading up to the main event. Enjoy world-class cuisine and great wine while you mix and mingle with the players. Admission: Tickets start at $350.

title: Glover Gill Tango at The Continental Club
address: 3700 Main St, Houston, TX 77002, United States
body: Glover Gill performs the passionate and captivating traditional music of Buenos Aires, Argentina. Solo Piano with Voice at 8 PM. Tango dance lessons at 7 PM. Admission: Free.

title: Gov’t Mule live at the House of Blues
address: 1204 Caroline St. Houston, TX 77002 United States
body: Gov’t Mule will come to Houston in support of their new album, Revolution Come… Revolution Go. Tickets start at $29.

title: LÉON live at the House of Blues
address: 1204 Caroline St. Houston, TX 77002 United States
body: Watch the Swedish singer LÉON perform at the House of Blues. Admission: tickets start at $18.

title: Kaleo in concert with ZZ Ward at the Reventon Music Center
address: 520 Texas Ave. Houston, TX 77002 United States
body: Icelandic alt-rockers Kaleo will come to Houston in support of their 2016 album, A/B. Their distinctive fusion of alternative rock and bluesy melodies makes for a stompin' good time. They'll be joined by opening act ZZ Ward. Tickets start at $30.

title: The Mystery of Edwin Drood at Obsidian Theater
address: 3522 White Oak Dr. Houston, TX 77007 United States
body: Winner of 5 Tony Awards, The Mystery of Edwin Drood is the musical "who done it" comedy based on Dicken's novel that allows the audience to determine the ending. Admission: Tickets start at $27.50.
